title: Un.Wavering
description: He said they’d lost the battle before it even began. It was no longer about winning, but of survival. And the only way to properly survive was to cut off the head of the beast. To destroy her enemy, Hayden knows she must uncover her enemy’s origins. She embarks on a mission to uncover the secrets she hopes will cripple this powerful, new threat. Joined by two powerful Alpha males, Hayden sets out to do just that. However, she soon realizes that the road to discovery is plagued with thwarting obstacles and vital setbacks. Faced with life changing revelations and tragic sacrifices, Hayden must decide whether to wither under the pressure or willfully conquer.
author: Reese Morgan
